Hero.short_description: Courageous protagonist who embarks on transformative journey, overcomes challenges for greater good.

Wise Old Man/Woman.short_description: Mentor figure providing guidance, knowledge, and spiritual wisdom to others.

Great Mother.short_description: Nurturing, creative force representing fertility, protection, and unconditional love.

Trickster.short_description: Clever, disruptive figure who challenges conventions through wit and deception.

Shadow.short_description: Dark aspect of psyche, representing repressed qualities and unconscious elements.

Anima/Animus.short_description: Feminine/masculine aspects within opposite gender, bridging conscious and unconscious.

Child.short_description: Symbol of innocence, potential, and new beginnings, representing hope and trust.

Warrior.short_description: Disciplined fighter archetype embodying courage, skill, and protective strength.

Magician.short_description: Transformer who connects with hidden knowledge and supernatural forces.

Lover.short_description: Passionate figure representing emotional connection, intimacy, and devotion.

King/Queen.short_description: Sovereign leader embodying order, authority, and benevolent power.

Rebel.short_description: Revolutionary who challenges existing order and fights for change.

Sage.short_description: Seeker of truth and wisdom, dedicated to understanding and sharing knowledge.

Creator.short_description: Innovative force bringing new things into being through imagination and skill.

Innocent.short_description: Pure, optimistic figure representing untainted goodness and faith.

Orphan.short_description: Abandoned one seeking belonging, often developing resilience through hardship.

Wanderer.short_description: Seeker on perpetual journey, discovering truth through exploration and independence.

Martyr.short_description: Self-sacrificing figure who surrenders for higher cause or others' benefit.

Devil.short_description: Tempter representing destructive forces, rebellion against divine, and materialism.

Divine Child.short_description: Miraculous youth embodying supernatural power and spiritual potential.

Eternal Youth.short_description: Ever-young spirit representing vitality, joy, and resistance to aging.

Earth Mother.short_description: Nurturing feminine force connected to nature, fertility, and sustenance.

Priestess.short_description: Spiritual mediator between divine and human realms, keeper of mysteries.

Wounded Healer.short_description: One who transforms personal suffering into ability to heal others.

Sacred King.short_description: Divine ruler whose life force is connected to land's prosperity.

Cosmic Man.short_description: Primordial being whose body represents structure of universe.

Shapeshifter.short_description: Transformative figure representing change, adaptability, and uncertainty.

Guardian.short_description: Protective figure who defends boundaries and tests worthiness.

Scapegoat.short_description: Bearer of community's sins or problems, sacrificed for collective cleansing.

Hermit.short_description: Solitary seeker who finds wisdom through isolation and contemplation.

Fool.short_description: Divine idiot whose innocence reveals deeper truths through apparent ignorance.

Judge.short_description: Discerning figure who weighs moral choices and dispenses justice.

Crone.short_description: Wise elderly woman representing death, rebirth, and transformative power.

Divine Twins.short_description: Dual aspects of single principle, often representing complementary forces.

Medicine Man/Woman.short_description: Spiritual healer bridging physical and supernatural realms.

Threshold Guardian.short_description: Challenger testing readiness for transformation or new stage.

Green Man.short_description: Vegetation deity representing cycles of nature and seasonal renewal.

Sacred Prostitute.short_description: Temple priestess embodying divine feminine and sacred sexuality.

Wolf.short_description: Wild instinctual nature, representing both threat and guidance.

Dragon.short_description: Powerful primordial force guarding treasure or wisdom.

Phoenix.short_description: Immortal bird symbolizing death, rebirth, and transformation through fire.

World Tree.short_description: Cosmic axis connecting different realms of existence.

Devil's Advocate.short_description: Challenger who tests beliefs by arguing opposite perspective.

Alchemist.short_description: Transformer who seeks to turn base materials into gold, physically or spiritually.

Fisher King.short_description: Wounded ruler whose illness affects entire kingdom's vitality.

Divine Androgyne.short_description: Being uniting masculine and feminine principles in perfect balance.

Prometheus.short_description: Cultural hero who brings divine gifts to humanity despite personal cost.
